::Lord Jhiaxus::

With his hindered manuverability, Windlord's shot strikes Jhiaxus' bad wing. The wing is nearly torn off at this point. Jhiaxus starts to roll out of control but stabalizes.

xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:                                  Windlord:
 
 Windlord fired at Jhiaxus's wing
 
 --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
 >
 > ::Kup::
 > 
 > Kup: I'm currently at max speed. Just try and ground this bot. 
 Which direction towards Atlantis?

 >

 >

 and makes it difficult for him to hold a stable course.
 > 
 > Jhiaxus launches two of his wing rockets at the shuttle and 
 attempts to keep pursuit of Kup and the Maximals.
 >

 >

 enemy.
 >

 defend itself.
